policies.cancellation: We require at least 24 hours' notice for cancellations. Cancellations made less than 24 hours before the appointment will be charged a 50% cancellation fee.
policies.late_arrival: If you arrive more than 15 minutes late, we may need to reschedule your appointment to ensure quality service for all clients.
policies.deposits: A credit card is required to hold appointments for services over $150. No charge will be made unless you no-show or cancel late.
policies.refunds: We stand behind our work. If you are not satisfied with your service, please contact us within 7 days for a complimentary correction.
policies.age_policy: Clients under 16 must be accompanied by a parent or guardian.
policies.health_and_safety: All tools are sanitized between clients. We use professional-grade disinfection protocols. Please let us know about any allergies or sensitivities before your appointment.

faqs.question: Do I need to make an appointment?
faqs.answer: We recommend booking an appointment to guarantee your preferred time and stylist. Walk-ins are welcome based on availability.

faqs.question: What forms of payment do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and cash.

faqs.question: Do you offer gift cards?
faqs.answer: Yes! Gift cards are available in any amount and can be purchased in-salon or on our website.

faqs.question: What should I do before my color appointment?
faqs.answer: Please arrive with dry, unwashed hair (no product). If you've used box color recently, let your stylist know during booking so we can plan accordingly.

faqs.question: Is there free parking?
faqs.answer: We offer complimentary valet parking on weekends. On weekdays, street metered parking is available nearby.

faqs.question: Can I bring my child?
faqs.answer: Children are welcome! We offer kids' haircuts for ages 12 and under. For safety, children must be supervised at all times.

faqs.question: Do you do wedding or bridal services?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer bridal hair and makeup packages. We recommend booking a trial session at least one month before the wedding. Contact us for custom bridal pricing.

faqs.question: How do I reschedule my appointment?
faqs.answer: You can call us or let our AI assistant help you reschedule. Just provide your name and we'll find your booking and move it to your preferred time.

faqs.question: What is your tip policy?
faqs.answer: Tipping is always appreciated but never expected. The industry standard is 15-20%. Tips can be added to your card payment or given in cash.

faqs.question: Do you use cruelty-free products?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are committed to using cruelty-free, salon-grade products from brands like Redken, Olaplex, and Davines.
